title: How to make Firefox go back to the timestamp of a video where you left off
content:
On other browsers, such as Opera and Brave, when watching a video, and then closing out of the browser, and later coming back to the video, it saves the timestamp at which you closed out the browser (or goes back around 10 seconds). On Firefox, this doesn't seem to be the case. Is this intentional? Can I enable this somehow?

(Btw, I know that there is an extension for this specifically for YouTube, but I'm referring to other streaming sites, and just videos in general)

Any help is appreciated, thanks!
creator: gusthesupercoolseal
